sentences.english: Large LCD with Chinese display, automatic controlled by computer, keyboard operation.
sentences.chinese: 全中文大屏幕液晶顯示，電腦自動控制，鍵盤操作。

sentences.english: The LCD screen has a crappy, thin plastic cover.
sentences.chinese: 液晶顯示屏幕上有一個蹩腳的，薄的塑料蓋。

sentences.english: A friendly human-machine interface is provided by keyboard input and LCD module.
sentences.chinese: 鍵盤輸入及液晶顯示模塊，提供了友好的人機界面。

sentences.english: Light guide body, lighting device, liquid crystal display device, and electronic device.
sentences.chinese: 導光體，照明裝置，液晶顯示裝置以及電子設備。

sentences.english: HD61830 generates dot-matrix LCD driven signal by its internal sequence generator.
sentences.chinese: 內部時序發生器產生點陣液晶顯示驅動信號。

sentences.english: So it Brings convenience to our lives . The appearance of LCM is a representative sign!
sentences.chinese: 液晶顯示模塊的出現就是其中一個典型的代表。

sentences.english: At the same time, we also produce sections of standard LCD modules.
sentences.chinese: 同時，我們還生產各款標準型液晶顯示模塊。
